name: Grow Stronger Together
description:
Made for the Brackey's 2021.1 game jam.

the theme was "stronger together"  so I made a constructive team building co-op game.  what grows stronger is both the ability to lift rocks, and the bond between the two people.  Yes, it's a little cheesy

you will need either two copies of the game running at the same time, or another person also playing the game.  you will both need to choose different paths (one red, one blue), and have a way to communicate throughout the game.  I'd suggest a voice chat like discord, or a phone call.

Press escape to exit the game when in the level.
